InstructionData.Title: BTC_-_BASE_TEMPERATURE_CONTROLLER
InstructionData.Author: D4RK GH0ST
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Script name: Base Temperature Controller # Description: # Author: Werner L. Gottschalt ## START
# Define the Hashes # StructureGasSensor define dSensorsHash -1252983604 # StructurePipeHeater define dHeatersHash -419758574 # StructureLogicDial define dDialsHash 554524804 # StructureTurboVolumePump define dPumpHash 1310794736 # StructurePoweredVentLarge define dOutVentHash -785498334 # StructureActiveVent define dInsVentHash -1129453144
# Define the Name Hashes define dDialMin HASH("BTC Min Temp") define dDialMax HASH("BTC Max Temp") define dSensors HASH("BTC Gas Sensor") define dHeaters HASH("BTC Heater") define dOutsideVent HASH("BTC External Vent") define dInsideVent HASH("BTC Internal Vent") define dPump HASH("BTC Pump")
# Define Celcius to Kelvin Offset define cKelvinOffSet 273.15 alias TurnOn r10 alias TurnOff r11
move TurnOn 1 move TurnOff 0
# Read the temperatures from sensors main: yield move r0 0 lbn r0 dSensorsHash dSensors Temperature Average # If no sensors found, repeat Main beq r0 0 main
# Read the Min and Max values from dials lbn r1 dDialsHash dDialMin Setting Minimum lbn r2 dDialsHash dDialMax Setting Minimum # Convert to Kelvin add r1 r1 cKelvinOffSet add r2 r2 cKelvinOffSet
# Calc the medium point between Min and Max Temp # r3 = (TempMin + TempMax) / 2 add r3 r1 r2 div r3 r3 2
# Verificar se a temperatura est fora dos limites # Check if the temperature is out of limits # If is below Min go to Heat blt r0 r1 heat # If is above Max go to Cool bgt r0 r2 cool
# Turn off all devices if temp is between limits disableAllDevices: sbn dInsVentHash dInsideVent On TurnOff sbn dOutVentHash dOutsideVent On TurnOff sbn dPumpHash dPump On TurnOff sbn dHeatersHash dHeaters On TurnOff j main
waitTempCool: yield lbn r0 dSensorsHash dSensors Temperature Average blt r0 r3 disableAllDevices j waitTempCool
waitTempHeat: yield lbn r0 dSensorsHash dSensors Temperature Average bgt r0 r3 disableAllDevices j waitTempHeat
# Activate the cooling system cool: sbn dInsVentHash dInsideVent On TurnOn sbn dOutVentHash dOutsideVent On TurnOn j waitTempCool
# Activate the heating system heat: sbn dPumpHash dPump On TurnOn sbn dHeatersHash dHeaters On TurnOn j waitTempHeat
## END
